picked_headlines.summary: Mellum enhances IDE code completion with multi-file context for JetBrains IDEs.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article is relevant for both engineers and managers as it provides a practical solution for improving productivity in software development environments.

picked_headlines.summary: 2025 DORA Report urges a focus on systems over metrics for AI strategy.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: The report offers strategic insights for management on integrating AI into engineering practices, making it valuable for decision-makers.

digest:
- *ZSMerge* introduces a novel KV cache compression method for LLMs, enhancing memory efficiency and speed without retraining. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.10714)
- *AMAQ* improves collaborative training of LLMs by adaptively quantizing activations, enhancing accuracy while reducing communication overhead. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.05468)
- *DeepV* is a model-agnostic framework for RTL code generation, enhancing performance using a high-quality dataset without specific training. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.05327)
- *MACE* optimizes LLMs for edge servers by balancing retraining and inference, reducing latency by 63% while maintaining high throughput. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.03283)
- *MetaLLMix* optimizes hyperparameters using meta-learning and XAI, outperforming traditional methods with reduced costs and faster training times. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.09387)
- *Graph-S3* improves graph retrieval in LLMs using synthetic supervision, enhancing accuracy and F1 scores in complex reasoning tasks. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.03323)
- *TeachLM* enhances LLMs for education using real student-tutor data, improving dialogue quality and pedagogical effectiveness. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.05087)
- *FedMentor* enhances privacy in federated LLMs for mental health, balancing confidentiality and utility with domain-aware differential privacy. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.14275)
- *Tiny but Mighty* optimizes multimodal model inference on small devices, enhancing efficiency and battery life through hardware-software co-design. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.05109)
- *OpenAI Dev Day 2025* highlighted its commitment to developers with new APIs and tools, emphasizing AGI distribution and app ecosystem growth. [Read more](https://www.latent.space/p/devday-2025)
